page.title: 09The Sewage Works
page.content: The sewage works was built in 1940. In 1983 it was modernized. My Dad works for Anglian Water. The difference between Anglian Water and Anglian Water Authority is that Anglian Water works with sewage and Anglian Water Authority works with clean water. The sewage works has five sludge tanks,a lake and a bridge. There is an electronic control panel which monitors the complete operation. The lake is for aeration. The water comes through three pipes. Then it goes through two revolving blades. Then it goes into the well where the bridge revolves.The fat is then washed into the sludge tanks.The fat is the thick black substance on top of the water. It then goes to Brigg where it goes through a more complicated device which continues the process of purification.
